name: Ai notes
tagline: Contains AI thoughts, findings and experiments
body:
Artificial Intelligence Notes
=============================

This document aggregates definitions, findings, thoughts and experiments that are related to AI with a strong focus on Machine Learning. It also contains some information about related fields such as Robotics and Computer Vision. It was created during the preparations for my masterâ€™s studies at Imperial College London.

_____________

How to read/use it
------------------
If you do not have any LaTeX tools installed, you can find a PDF snapshot from March 23, 2014 here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9Rk7YaGlozGdTJjV2x1TVhZcWM/edit?usp=sharing


*notes.tex* contains the entire LaTeX sources including figures, no other files needed. This document has been written on a Mac using TeXShop, no additional packages necessary. If you use a different LaTeX suite, you might have to install some packages such as *tikz*.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
